bugFixes.summary: Modify the reporter so that it read information from a 'reporter.xml' configuration file
Server on test.o.o is crashing. Might be covjson?
Update credentials ingest to use dedicated file
Modify libdap so that it processes DAP4 error responses when they are returned as part of a data request.
make the covjson handler stream responses
BES timeout issue seems to crash bes master listener
HDF data handling
Modify the netCDF handler so that it builds a DMR response directly instead of using the DDS object.
Contact S3 reps about the access times and their stddev and find out if these can be lowered.
Convert libdap4 README to README.md (markdown)
Switch the DAP2 parser to use 'slices' in place of 'indices'
Make the SQL Handler work
Global metadata (attributes) appear at the end of the DMR++
In the DMR, Groups are always printed last. This can be a problem and might be fixed if we listed them first
Collect timing data for clients running in the cloud
Work with the GDAL community/developers to improve the DAP client
Write a testsuite for build_dmrpp
Improved handling of S3 response behavior
Make libdap and BES have a single source of truth for version numbers.
Add a "copy url" button to the IFH
Add support for the ERRDAP value-based subsetting of Grids
Create OLFS ConfigurationManager
